<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

Create a new webhook

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"JSON body","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"attributes":{"type":"object"},"id":{"type":"string"},"enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"url":{"type":"string"},"secret":{"type":"string"},"createdBy":{"type":"string"},"createdAt":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"realm":{"type":"string"},"eventTypes":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"WebhookRepresentation"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
